case 176: talk("Hey! Stop! You are not allowed in here.", 922); break;

In the dialouge cases

and that

if(NPCID == 922){ NpcDialogue = 176; NpcDialogueSend = false;

in case 55, it works fine

item.title: Npc dialouge
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

[b]Files Modified:NPCHandler.java

Difficulty:0.1/10

Knowledge Needed:Reading & Copy/Paste.

Step 1.[/b]

Search for:

				annoyNpcs(i);

Step 2.

Now Place this Code below it:

if (npcs[i].npcType == XXXX && misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT HERE"; }

Step 3.

Save+Compile, Run.

Tell me if you need anything else.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc dialouge
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

Hey guys, im trying to make an npc speak.

This is what ive added so far.

if(NPCID ==922 ){ skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 175; }

In my case 155. Does this need to go anywhere specific in there, or just with the rest of it.

Also ive added.

case 175: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Hallloo", 4885); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Do i perhaps need to add the npcs Id , somewhere in the one above?Im not sure. Ive added the one above in
public void UpdateNPCChat() {

Cheers guys.

Read full topic
